DOC.brief_summary: Step 1: Identification and characterisation of the TREM1L protein from samples already available characterised at the hospital Central of Nancy Step 2: Study of the isoforms of TREM1L in correlation with the prognosis of sepsis, Step 3: implementation of assay methods for TREM1L (ELISA or SUPRA MS) Step 4: Validation of assays for TREM1L and its isoforms in a larger number of subjects (inclusion of samples from Dijon CHU and Besan√ßon CHU)
DOC.brief_title: Determination of the Nature of the Endogenous Ligand of TREM-1 and Its Use as a New Diagnostic Biomarker in Sepsis
DOC.criteria: patients hospitalised in a Medical Intensive Care unit whatever the reason written informed consent obtained patients less than 18 years old or under guardianship, persons without national health insurance.
